name: human_handover
description: Escalates a chat to human agents when control triggers are identified. This function adds a central notification explaining the escalation reason, marks the chat as unread, and removes the current agent assignment to allow human takeover.

company_id.description: The unique identifier of the company

central_notification.description: The reason for escalation that will be added as a central notification

chat.description: Updated chat object showing unread status and unassigned state

id.description: The unique identifier of the updated chat
